roleset.name: elect again
roleset.note: REELECT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reelect' based on adding 're' to the beginning of each example of 'elect' in elect.xml. (from reelect.01-v predicate notes)
REELECTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, reelect.01. Corresponds to VNcls appoint-29.1. (from reelection.01-n)

example.name: hey, whaddya know, it does occur in the active voice
example.text: Holders at the meeting reelected a full slate of Canadian Express nominees to Enfield's 11-member board.
example.arg: a full slate of Canadian Express nominees

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: While Americans took a step forward in social liberalism with their reelection of Obama and rising support for social policies such as gay marriage and immigration reform, politics in Europe has taken a dangerous turn to the right.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: The NJDC congratulates Bill Nelson on his reelection to Senate, calling him ?a key ally to the Florida Jewish community ...
